level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules to implement the provisions of this part.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-205
level.text: For Law 15-205, see notes following ยง 1-327.51.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority pursuant to the Emergency and Non-Emergency Number Telephone Calling Systems Fund Act of 2000 and Section 3208 of the Office of Unified Communications Establishment Act of 2004, see Mayor's Order 2009-85, May 27, 2009 (56 DCR 6826).
